Publication.title: Ahp
Publication.snippet: A young boy has an unlikely encounter in the Cambodian forest of this flash piece . . .

Publication.title: Sympathy for the Demoness
Publication.snippet: Ashra may be a demon from the fiery pits of the underworld, but she’ll realize there are different sorts of hell when she runs afoul of an unlikely sorcerer . . .

Publication.title: Shrieks in the Snow, Shrieks in the Night
Publication.snippet: A deserter may have more to fear in the dark of the woods than he would have faced on the battlefield in this piece of dark fantasy . . .

Publication.title: Roogcha
Publication.publisher: A Little Death For The Holiday, SFM Storytime
Publication.snippet: So, you think Thanksgiving with your family is a nightmare? Read this story, and you might end up thinking otherwise . . .

Publication.title: The Basement
Publication.snippet: Something absolutely horrible lurks in the basement of this drabble . . .

Publication.title: Thought's in Bed with Pain (Reprint)
Publication.snippet: When a young woman's marriage starts to go south, her dreams of the perfect man begin to lead her towards some dark temptations...

Publication.title: The Cold
Publication.snippet: The wintery winds are cold and the heart of a cruel man is even colder in this tale of dark fantasy . . .

Publication.title: Daniel's Scream (Reprint)
Publication.snippet: This account of a childhood experience with the seemingly supernatural leaves people screaming . . .

Publication.title: Bad Spirit
Publication.snippet: The Gravedigger rides again! And this time he's on a desperate mission to save a boy from a terrible creature right out of Native American myth. And it's hungry . . .

Publication.title: Diao Si Gui
Publication.snippet: Regret is for the living and vengeance is for the dead in this quick ghost story . . .

Publication.title: His Bright Muse
Publication.snippet: A blossoming romance shows signs of wilting as dark secrets come to light in this Victorian era tale . . .

Publication.title: A Long Way from Dolly
Publication.publisher: Drabble Harvest #8: Dear Ashley in the 24th Century
Publication.snippet: In this drabble, the troubles of love and cloning in the 24th century are broached through a "Dear Ashley" correspondence . . .

Publication.title: Little Bastard
Publication.snippet: If you've ever had a killer toothache, then you just might be able to relate to this weird story . . .

Publication.title: Me, My Zombie-Self, and the Blonde Girl
Publication.snippet: What's worse than being an awakened youth? Well, being an awkward zombie after the apocalypse comes . . .

Publication.title: Monsters
Publication.snippet: This drabble proves that monsters can take all shapes and sizes . . .

Publication.title: The Life and Death of Jacoby Fogg
Publication.publisher: Stay Weird and Keep Writing Print Co.
Publication.snippet: Things are awfully murky in this poem about the life of poor Jacoby Fogg . . .

Publication.title: Max
Publication.snippet: Each of us has feared a Bogeyman at some point, back when we were children. Maybe we had good reason to . . .

Publication.title: Texas Awaits
Publication.snippet: The mysterious Gravedigger makes his grand return to print with this long-lost journal entry, composed by a figure straight out of history . . .

Publication.title: Kaidan
Publication.snippet: In the Japanese language, "kaidan" can be roughly translated as "ghost story," and that's exactly what this quick drabble is . . .

Publication.title: The Release
Publication.snippet: There's kinky, and then there's whatever this is . . .

Publication.title: The Gnarl
Publication.snippet: A lonesome little girl makes a unique friend in this piece of dark fantasy . . .

Publication.title: Harper's Glen
Publication.snippet: Superstition and local legend are abound in "Harper's Glen;" meanwhile, love is conquering death itself in "Undying."

Publication.title: Carly's Seventh
Publication.snippet: It's little Carly's birthday, and her father has bought quite the peculiar present for her . . .

Publication.title: Amore
Publication.snippet: A romantic vacation becomes a little less lovey-dovey when a unique gift is given from husband to wife . . .

Publication.title: Punxsutawney Elegy
Publication.snippet: Follow a man as he traverses the waste of a post-apocalyptic world, determined to enact a strange sort of vengeance . . .

Publication.title: The Spot
Publication.publisher: Flash Fiction Offensive, Out of the Gutter
Publication.snippet: Romance isn't always easy. Sometimes you have to work at it and go to great lengths to figure things out. In this flash piece, those lengths lead a couple out into the woods on a very special rendezvous . . .

Publication.title: Though He Walks
Publication.snippet: The undead have inherited the earth, but one man still wanders in hopes of salvation . . .

Publication.title: The Time I Done Pranked Some Spacemen
Publication.snippet: The southern swamps of the U.S. offer plenty of rare sights to see: an array of wildlife, colorful flora, and maybe even an extraterrestrial or two . . .

Publication.title: Drag
Publication.snippet: Troubles arise when an average joe comes home to a strange and unexpected visitor . . .

Publication.title: Separated Again
Publication.snippet: Fall in love. Split up. Reunite. And in this drabble, it goes to pieces all over again . . .

Publication.title: Serial Serendipity
Publication.snippet: Being a serial killer isn't all it's cracked up to be . . . or so I've been told. There's a lot of planning involved—and in spite of it all, some things are just left to a strange bit of chance . . .

Publication.title: The Pitch
Publication.snippet: Door to door salespeople have been known for selling a rather odd array of items and offers in the past; this story and its salesman have something extremely odd to pitch . . .

Publication.title: Mental Check
Publication.snippet: Ever go to the store and feel like you've forgotten to get something . . . ?

Publication.title: Screwed
Publication.snippet: "Screwing around" can lead to being just plain screwed, if you're caught . . .

Publication.title: Old Shuck
Publication.snippet: If you hear its howl, run for your life; if you see it, pray for your soul. Old Shuck is in the streets, and it may just be searching for you . . .

Publication.title: Goodnight's Alternative Carnival of Curiosities
Publication.snippet: The Vernaldi Organ has a history as striking as its appearance; wherever it has gone, tragedy has tended to follow. But when an enterprising carnival owner gets the opportunity to buy it, its sensational reputation may be too much for him to pass up—no matter the potential consequences . . .

Publication.title: Separated
Publication.snippet: See just how hard being separated from your loved ones can be in this quick drabble . . .

Publication.title: I Have a Very Good Brain, and I've Said a Lot of Things
Publication.snippet: Being the President of the United States isn't all it's cracked up to be. There's always something to deal with: press conferences, meeting with world leaders, zombie outbreaks . . .

Publication.title: Merry Mary
Publication.snippet: Sometimes, an urban legend turns out to be a little more than just legend . . .

Publication.title: Mr. Mean
Publication.publisher: The Sirens Call #30, "Death In All Its Glory!"
Publication.snippet: Friendship is a wonderful thing. Most of the time . . .

Publication.title: Crazy?
Publication.snippet: Every second changes everything . . .

Publication.title: Bad, Bad, Bad
Publication.snippet: Santa Claus isn't the only one who might pay you a visit come Christmastime . . .

Publication.title: Krampuslauf
Publication.snippet: A Krampuslauf is a lively celebration that can be great fun — or just terrifying . . .

Publication.title: Mrs. Krampen
Publication.snippet: Two young men are thinking with their Yule logs when they try a little blackmail on a rather peculiar woman . . .

Publication.title: Ah, Love
Publication.snippet: Love is strange — kind of like this 100 word drabble . . .

Publication.title: Beast
Publication.snippet: In this Gothic little tale, one should be wary of what lurks in the dark — and in the self . . .

Publication.title: Superstition
Publication.snippet: Superstitions — childish, foolish, and utter hogwash, right? Well, this account of a young boy's Halloween night from long ago may prove otherwise . . .

Publication.title: Little Green Man
Publication.snippet: It's the day after St. Patrick's Day, and a group of country boys are on their way back home after a holiday of drinking and good times. But an unlikely encounter is about to bring the good times to a screeching halt . . .

Publication.title: Upset," "Venom," "Heretic," & "Nuts
Publication.snippet: In this ezine, you'll find one short story and three flash pieces that are short on words, but full of malice, hilarity, and — perhaps — even a little poignancy. Download for FREE and read for yourself!

Publication.title: Her Name's Not John
Publication.snippet: There's "toilet humor," and then there's humor about toilets. With this story of a young man's unlikely infatuation, the line between the two gets blurred . . .

Publication.title: Chirp
Publication.publisher: Ghostlight, The Magazine of Terror: Winter 2016
Publication.snippet: Ron can't stand the noise of crickets chirping outside his window at night. It bugs him. But the noise soon goes from being a simple nuisance to something else entirely...

Publication.title: Gravedigger: Six Feet Deep
Publication.snippet: These six supernatural-western stories follow the strange, violent, and mysterious life of the title figure, the Gravedigger. Traveling across the United States circa 1800s, the enigmatic man known only as the Gravedigger seeks out outlaws and wrong-doers, greeting them with his revolver and saying his farewells with a freshly-dug grave. Along the way, he encounters the wilder things the Wild West has to offer, including the undead, horrid monsters, and the stuff of legends and folklore ...

Publication.title: Thoughts in Bed with Pain
Publication.snippet: When a young woman's marriage starts to go south, her dreams of the perfect man begin to lead her towards some dark temptations...

Publication.title: The Stranger
Publication.snippet: In an Old West saloon, customers regale each other with stories of a strange figure being spotted throughout the Wild West – and who buries those he goes looking for...

Publication.title: Manifest Tragedy
Publication.publisher: The Nightmare Collective: An Anthology of Short Horror Stories
Publication.snippet: Three friends taking a road-trip to a rock concert come across a hitchhiker who may not be as meek and mild as she appears...

Publication.title: Murmur
Publication.snippet: A simple walk through the woods was all that Jacob Crane needed to get away from his troubles – a chance to be alone and to unwind. But he is not alone. Something in the woods is whispering through the trees, and Jacob is listening...

Publication.title: Daniel's Scream
Publication.snippet: This account of a childhood experience with the seemingly supernatural leaves people screaming...

Publication.title: Damned Happy
Publication.snippet: The clown at his daughter's birthday party is no laughing matter for a man who has a fear of clowns – especially when the entertainer returns for a party of its own...

Publication.title: Caress
Publication.snippet: After the tragic death of his wife, Christopher desperately tries to cope with his loss and with life.

Publication.title: Before the Ash
Publication.snippet: A young man starts to feel the heat when a mysterious urn and an even more mysterious note are left on his work-desk...
